344180.name: Valiant
344180.description:
Multiplayer virtual reality combat for the Oculus Rift and HTC Vive

Valiant is a medieval combat game that thrusts you into multiplayer team battles. Plan your attack strategy with your teammates before charging the enemy with melee and ranged weapons.

Features:
  • Multiplayer mounted combat with medieval ranged and melee weapons
  • Dedicated servers with five versus five online team battles
  • Leaderboards to compare your skills against other players
  • Full ingame positional VoIP to strategize with teammates or demoralize opponents
  • 3D HRTF positional audio for an exciting and realistic audio experience]
